Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.events

Class SetCurrentPlayerEvent

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.events.Event
it.polimi.ingsw.network.events.SetCurrentPlayerEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SetCurrentPlayerEvent
extends Event
This Event is used by the server to notify the clients of a game about the current player, setting a new value for it
See Also:
